sourcesContent:
<template>
    
</template>

<script>

export default ({
    name:"HomeView",
    data(){
        return {
            images:["/slider/sl1.jpg","/slider/sl2.jpg","/slider/sl3.jpg"],
            currentIndex:0,
            intervalId:null
        }
    },
    mounted(){
        this.startSlider();
    },
    methods:{
        nextSlide(){
            this.currentIndex=(this.currentIndex +1) % this.images.length;
        },
        prevSlide(){
            this.currentIndex=(this.currentIndex -1) % this.images.length;
        },
        startSlider(){
            this.intervalId=setInterval(()=>{
                this.nextSlide();
            },2000)
        },
    }
})
</script>
<style scoped>

</style>
